articles.title: Banks will have to shut shop if they don't innovate, says KV Kamath - Moneycontrol
articles.description: "If I would have been in a bank today where there is no change and innovation, it would have been a nerve wracking experience for me," Kamath said.
articles.content:
Veteran banker KV Kamath advised banks to adapt, learn and modify the policies and working model to keep functioning. For banks who fail to do so, they might have to close shops, Kamath said.

articles.title: Banks Can't Use Look Out Circulars As Measure To Recover Money From Creditors: Delhi High Court - Live Law - Indian Legal News
